title: Bug 22568[Key Bindings] F3, F4 and other keys seem to be broken
description: Build 20020813For some reasons F3 and F4 stopped working in several views.Also, [Delete] key doesn't work anymore in Search view without having changedanything there. I heard about an SWT change in that area? Since we are innonbreaking API mode for 2.1 I guess this changes needs to reverted.
